title: Crypto Long Trades Account for 90% of Total Liquidations as Bitcoin, Ether Slump
description: One trading firm has a price target of as low as $24,000 in the coming months in the absence of immediate market catalysts.

title: Bitcoin Slides to $28.3K After Leveraged Funds Ramp Up Bearish Bets
description: Two-thirds of leverage funds' positions are short, one observer said, noting the bearish bias of sophisticated traders.

title: Shiba Inu Breaks Ground with the Launch of Shibarium Layer-2 Blockchain
description: In an unprecedented and audacious move, Shiba Inu, the renowned memecoin, has catapulted itself into the limelight by launching its Shibarium layer-2 scaling solution on the mainnet. This monumental development not only underscores the coin’s metamorphosis from a playful token to a robust blockchain entity but also sets the stage for a new era in ... Read more
